text: Tokkel maggo tuxxiqiy addunyaa kee akeeral inkih loonut maraanamkeh (yacdureenim), Kaadu timixxige ayrooraa (qerfâ Qiidih ayroo kee tet lakal tan sidiica ayró kinnuk) kee Yalli lacak keenih yecee affara xiyyu (gaalaay, laay, wadaraay illi kinnuk) yasguuden waqdi Yallih migaq cusaanamkeh keenih yeceeh yan niqmatih faatoh, tokkel woo lacih cadók-tu akumaay tumaliy gibdi gadaama tibbixe kak oskoma
